author: gnodet
msg: SM-1466: Avoid using a DOM representation when possible when using the <http:soap-consumer/> with the JBI wrapper

author: ritchiem
msg: Moved the Reflection Wrapping code used by the system tests to the system test. If they are left in common then we must include the common directory when using the systest-testing frameworks no matter the version of Qpid being tested. Whilst this is probably not a problem as long as the classpath is carefully set up it does introduce another potential uncertainty to any test failure.

author: gkossakowski
msg: Stick to released versions. There is no reason for using SNAPSHOT versions at the moment.

author: gkossakowski
msg: Introduced resource filter feature as explained here: http://article.gmane.org/gmane.text.xml.cocoon.devel/78158
The resource filtering is used for *all* resources being processed by Spring Configurator including beans defintions and property files.
The resource filter itself is a simple class implementing one method of ResourceFilter interface.
Added a new schema that covers new configuration element for a filter setup.
